subject: Follow up on proposal discussion
notes: Sent detailed proposal with pricing breakdown. Client interested in premium package. Scheduled call for next week to discuss implementation timeline.

subject: Initial discovery call
notes: Great call! Michael is very interested in our enterprise solution. Main pain points: scalability and integration with existing systems. He wants to see a demo next week.

subject: Contract negotiation meeting
notes: Productive meeting discussing contract terms. Emily agreed to most points but wants to negotiate payment schedule. She prefers quarterly payments instead of annual.

subject: Contract sent for review
notes: Sent final contract for Sarah's review. All pricing and terms finalized based on our previous discussions. Waiting for legal team approval on their end.

subject: LinkedIn connection established
notes: Connected with David on LinkedIn. He mentioned they're looking to upgrade their current solution within the next 6 months. Good timing for our Q2 push.

subject: Deal closure confirmation
notes: Fantastic news! Lisa confirmed they're moving forward with the full enterprise package. Contract signed and payment processed. Implementation starts next month.
